subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Soon, Stanford Coach Mark Marquess will win his 1,300th game and move into the top 10 for career victories among N.C.A.A. Division I coaches. He is already in the top 10 for active coaches.
snippet: Soon, Stanford Coach Mark Marquess will win his 1,300th game and move into the top 10 for career victories among N.C.A.A. Division I coaches. He is already in the top 10 for active coaches.
